item.title: 17 Flower Names for Girls That Are Totally Charming and Ladylike
item.description:
Gardens and flower shops are your happy place, so why not use them to draw inspiration for your soon-to-arrive little girl? Here, 17 floral baby names that are just, well, the loveliest.

RELATED: 15 Old-Fashioned Baby Names That Will Melt Your Heart

ASTER

ASTER

Meaning: Star. (As in, will light up your life.)

IRIS

IRIS

Meaning: Rainbow.

LILY

LILY

Meaning: Purity and beauty. Especially while snoozing.

RELATED: 17 French Baby Names That Are Prime for An American Takeover

DAISY

DAISY

Meaning: Day’s eye. Clever.

HEATHER

HEATHER

Meaning: A purplish-pink plant that’s resilient and thrives even in poor conditions. (Literal? Yes. Still adorable? Totally.)

ROSE

ROSE

Meaning: Of the rose blossom. Awww.

AZALEA

AZALEA

Meaning: Dry. (Sadly, this is in reference to soil conditions, not diapers.)

POPPY

POPPY

Meaning: The flowering plant. (Also, a nickname for Penelope.)

RELATED: 15 British Baby Names That Are Positively Brilliant

VIOLET

VIOLET

Meaning: Purple.

JASMINE

JASMINE

Meaning: Fresh-scented.

MARIGOLD

MARIGOLD

Meaning: Mary’s gold.

POSEY

POSEY

Meaning: Bunch of flowers. Also, belongs to the lord.

DAHLIA

DAHLIA

Meaning: From the valley. (As in nature, not outside of L.A.)

PETUNIA

PETUNIA

Meaning: Bright with trumpet-shaped flowers.

MAGNOLIA

MAGNOLIA

Meaning: Loves nature. Also, smelling flowers up close.

CALLA

CALLA

Meaning: Beautiful.

SURI

SURI

Meaning: Red rose. (Per Katie and Tom.)

RELATED: 15 Irish Baby Names That We’re Totally Going to Steal
item.author: editor@purewow.com (PureWow)
